ComicInfo.Summary:
War tears everyone apart. As British forces fight their way through Tunisia in the spring of 1943, Royal Air Force pilot Robin Whittaker meets Captain Antonio Valenzano, his Italian opposite number- and prisoner of war. Antonio's life binds mystery and tragedy in a conundrum that will haunt both men, but the war may well devour them long before the answers come. Part one of The Flower of My Heart, by Garth Ennis and Tomas Aira. Available with Regular, Wraparound Covers by Thomas Aria, Good Girl Nose Art and Battle Damage Premium Covers by Matt Martin.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Tomas Aira | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Tomas Aira | 2 | GGNA | Good Girl Nose Art Cover | Matt Martin | 3 | RI | Battle Damage Retailer Order Incentive Cover | Matt Martin | 4 |
